title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber Cedes Russia to Yandex
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Uber Cedes Russia to Yandex
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Eric Newcomer Reporter:Tech Start-UPS Bloomberg News Discussing Uber merging their ride-hailing businesses in Russia with Yandex NV in $3.7 billion merger deal.
